```{r setup, include=FALSE}
## Sets defaults for R chunks
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, # echo = TRUE means that your code will show
                      warning=FALSE,
                      message=FALSE,
                      fig.retina = 2,
                      fig.align = "center", 
                      dpi = 100,
                      # fig.path='Figs/', ## where to save figures
                      fig.height = 3,
                      fig.width = 3)

library(here)
source(here("setup.R"))
```
